extension.summary: TV Guide with XMLTV and streaming support
extension.description: The TV guide gives you an overview on whats on TV right now, so you don't have to change the channel away from XBMC![CR]EPG data can be retrieved from YouSee.tv and XMLTV file or URL.[CR][CR]Navigate using the arrow keys and change page using channel + / -.[CR][CR]If you have comments or suggestions for this addon, please feel free to participate in the debate on my blog at http://tommy.winther.nu
